title: Minimal reliance on coal for electricity
description: In 2021, only 0.00017% of Latvia's electricity was produced from coal sources, indicating a minimal reliance on coal for energy production.

title: Low prevalence of underweight children
description: In 2021, only 0.3% of children under 5 in Latvia were underweight, showcasing a low prevalence of underweight children.

title: Low prevalence of stunting in children
description: In 2021, only 0.5% of children under 5 in Latvia were affected by stunting, indicating a low prevalence of growth issues.
